name: Extraterreslap
description:
Extraterreslap is a 2D fighting game, where each one of the two people who play control one of the two aliens (Flotto and Plotto) to score a point when the other player falls from the map, so they win when they have scored 5 points (Set!).

New update (V1.8.1) -> Full music added and fixed.

=·= Controls =·=

Flotto

  • Right & Left Arrow Keys -> Move
  • Down Arrow Key (Air) -> Quick fall
  • Up Arrow Key -> Jump / Double jump
  • (Hold) Move Keys + Numpad 3 -> Sprint
  •  (Smash) Numpad 2 -> Punch
  • (Smash) Numpad 2 + Down Arrow Key -> Minipunch
  • (Hold) Numpad 3 + Down Arrow Key -> Laser
  • Numpad 3 + Flash Mark active -> Flash
  • (Hold) Up Arrow Key + Down Arrow Key + Numpad 2 + Numpad 3 + Final exclamation -> Megabeam
  • (Hold) Numpad 1 + Up Arrow Key -> Taunt 1

Plotto

  • A & D -> Move
  • S (Air) -> Quick fall
  • W -> Jump / Double jump
  • (Hold) Move Keys + H -> Sprint
  •  (Smash) G -> Punch
  • (Smash) G + S -> Minipunch
  • (Hold) H + S -> Laser
  • H + Flash Mark active -> Flash
  • (Hold) W + S + G + H + Final exclamation -> Megabeam
  • (Hold) F + W -> Taunt 1

Extra

  • Esc (in game) -> Return lo level select

=·= Remind =·=

This is my first game, it may be a bit crappy, but it's just for casual games with your friends, family, etc.

If you see a bug, please tell me so i can repair it when i have time.

PD: Mounts map is in progress, it has many bugs to be resolved. (Intro and other screens have some flashy lights)
